tooltips.defaultTeam: All records created by this user will be related to this team by default.
tooltips.userName: Letters a-z, numbers 0-9 and underscores are allowed.
tooltips.teams: Teams which this user belongs to. Access control level is inherited from team roles.
tooltips.roles: Additional access roles. Use it if user doesn't belong to any team or you need to extend access control level only for this user.

messages.passwordWillBeSent: Password will be sent to user's email address.
